page.title: 19Social Concerns-Witton
page.content: {Ridlington Church}The village is divided over the possible closure of the Church.Â£30,000 is needed to repair the tower,in addition to the annual Diocesan Quota.Some feel that the scattered population & poor numbers at services mean this is not a practical undertaking. {Crostwight Heath}Owing to vociferous protest the burning of the heath was postponed from spring to autumn.This is a popular beauty spot & home for many birds.Concern is also about controlling the burning. {Main Services}Owing to flat land & high water table most houses have trouble with septic tank rdainage.The emptying charge is Â£22.A small plant services council houses in Ridlington. {Health services}There is widespread concern over possible closure of the maternity unit at N.Walsham hospital.
